name: R J
text: They made my day, Mr. Pee Wee is awesome. He helped me with my order. Made sure I was completely satisfied with my order. The wings are just right. The pizza is perfect, yummy!! Most of all the customer service was excellent!!. My …More

name: Amanda Simopoulos
text: I have an allergy. Called them, took the time to explain, etc. Get my pizza... They literally put the ingredient I'm allergic to on the pizza!!! When I called, they rightfully refunded but didn't even act phased about the fact that they could have killed me.

name: David Prather
text: The staff here is ALWAYS super friendly,  the food is amazing, it always comes fast and fresh! The Sicilian meat lovers pizza and some cheesey garlic bread and my whole family is happy and full! I recommend this over any other chain pizza place anyday!

name: Kelli Britt
text: The food was not that good, ordered the dessert pizza which tasted super doughy and the pepperoni pizza roll ups which tasted old. but my delivery driver was amazing. Believe his name was Ryan. So 0 stars for my food 5 stars for my driver.

name: Scott Carroll
text: I would love to give this place 5 stars because the pizza and prices are great, seriously, the thin crust double bacon cheeseburger isn't like crack... it IS crack! …More

name: Jonathan Hall
text: Great stuff always a friendly employee. I just feel bad they have to work by themselves. 5 stars because despite being alone the quality didnt dip.

name: Christopher Kluck
text: Hudson Bend Gattis has always made a great pizza. Very consistent quality and value.

name: Joe Rosas
text: Food was fresh and hot Small location but it was fast

name: Alex E.
text: Love chicken wings and pizza - fast friendly service

name: NocturnalFury
text: Fast delivery, affordable price, and the delivery driver was very polite. Pizza was great! Definitely a step up from over a year ago. They must have new management. Thanks!

name: Tessa Janowski
text:
I give 5 stars for the AMAZING woman who was running the front counter.
Everyone around her was yelling and upset, but she kept her cool and continued to smile and work. …More

text: We stayed at a bed and breakfast nearby.  I found Gatti's on a local Google search.   This was some really good pizza! I loved their seasoned parmesan cheese too!  The best feature I've ever seen at a pizza joint is that they have a drive thru for pick up.

name: Amy Johnson

text: Great pizza and their staff are always really friendly and helpful. Pretty good prices too! 5/5

text: Worst service EVER. They delivered a pizza to an address. Not mine. Said someone signed for it but couldn't tell me who. Hung up on me multiple times and told me to go ask my neighbors to find out where my pizza is.
